verses.text: Aljocab' vach' lolonel d'a Jehová, aton tz'ak'an vip. Aton val tzin k'ayb'ani, syak'anpax in jelanil yic vach' svak' oval.
Aton icha in nhaq'ueen, icha val in cuartel, in Columal paxi. A' tzin k'ub'aneli. A' ayoch venhuloc. A' tz'ak'anoch eb' chonhab' d'a yalanh in mandar.
Mamin Jehová ¿tas val jab'oc quelk'och a onh anima onh tic d'a yol a sat, yuj chi' tzonh a nacoti? ¿Tas val quelk'ochi yuj chi' tzonh a ya'ilej?
A onh anima onh tic, lajan onh icha val b'aj squik' quik', axo co q'uinal icha val junoc enhul tz'eq'ui.
Mamin, jac spuertail satchaanh yic tzach emuli. Tzach emul d'a jolomtac vitz yic sq'ue stab'il lum uuj.
Julemta junoc a jul-lab', aton jun k'ak' tz'ek' copnajoc, tza pechanb'at eb' ayoch ajk'olal d'ayach d'a scal somk'olal.
Masanto d'a satchaanh chi' tzaq'uemta a k'ab' tzin a colanel d'a jun a' mar te nivan, syalelk'ochi, aton eb' ch'oc chonhab'il.
Colinel d'a eb' esalvum chi', aton eb' syik'chaanh sk'ab' syak'an sti' d'a tastac manh yeloc.
Ach in Diosal, ol in b'itej jun ak' b'it d'ayach. Ol in b'itan yed' sb'ital salterio d'ayach.
Uuj val, syal yuj eb' rey, a ach ton ix in a col d'a q'uen espada tzonh milanchamoc, a in David a checab' in tic.
A ticnaic, colinel d'a yol sk'ab' eb' ch'oc chonhab'il, eb' esalvum syak' sti' d'a tastac manh yeloc syala'.
Q'uib'ocab' eb' cuninal icha val tas tz'avchaj to ya ilab'il. A eb' ix quisil lajanocab' eb' ix icha junoc yoyal templo tzeyb'il, te vach' yilji.
A co pat, b'ud'jinacocab'el yuj junjun macanh vael. A nok' co calnel, q'uib'ocab' sb'isul nok' d'a smilal. Manhxo b'ischajb'enocab' tz'aj sb'isul nok' co vacax.
Uneviocab' nok', mocab' tonhejoc tz'ek' sti' nok'. Malajocab' mach tz'el yav d'a yol scalleal co chonhab' yuj yaelal.
Yelxo val te vach' yic junoc chonhab' to icha chi' yaji. Yelxo val te vach' yic junoc chonhab' to a Jehová ayoch sDiosaloc.
